parameters.name: EntitiesToFullyDefine
parameters.description: True to fully define all entities, false to fully define only the entities selected

parameters.name: UseRelations
parameters.description: True to use relations, false to not

parameters.name: RelationsToApply
parameters.description: Relations to apply as defined in swSketchFullyDefineRelationType_e

parameters.name: UseDimensions
parameters.description: True to use dimensions, false to not

parameters.name: HorizontalDimScheme
parameters.description: 0 = Chain 1 = Baseline 2 = Ordinate

parameters.name: HorizontalDatumDisp
parameters.description: Horizontal datum (model edge, model vertex, sketch line, sketch point), or, if Nothing or null, use entity with selection mark = 6

parameters.name: VerticalDimScheme
parameters.description: 0 = Chain 1 = Baseline 2 = Ordinate

parameters.name: VerticalDatumDisp
parameters.description: Vertical datum (model edge, model vertex, sketch line, sketch point), or, if Nothing or null, use entity with selection mark = 6

parameters.name: HorizontalDimPlacement
parameters.description: 0 = Above sketch 1 = Below sketch

parameters.name: VerticalDimPlacement
parameters.description: 0 = Right of sketch 1 = Left of sketch
